features: [Experience Immersive Audio] The karaoke machine for adults features dual 15W full-range speakers, advanced noise reduction, clear sound, powerful bass, and balanced volume. Enjoy high-definition stereo sound without distortion, even at bluetooth karaoke machine high volumes, creating a remarkable musical ambiance for your gatherings.

[Discover the joy of duet singing] The portable karaoke machine includes 2 rechargeable wireless bluetooth microphones. They automatically pair with the karaoke machine when turned on, covering an area of about 50 feet. You control mic volume remotely, eliminate original vocals with one tap, and select from 6 fun sound effects. Karaoke machine Advanced digital signal processing enhances sound quality and minimizes feedback. Ideal for duet, group karaoke, classrooms, or fitness sessions.

[Explore diverse sound effects] The karaoke machine pa system boasts 6 unique voice effects: Echo, Original, Male, Female, Child, and Monster, adding unexpected creativity and entertainment to your performance. You can effortlessly switch between these effects using the bluetooth microphone or the buttons on the karaoke machine,. Unleash your creativity effortlessly.

[Be amazed by the fusion of lights and music] The karaoke machine speaker with microphone features vibrant LED lights, offering 4 dynamic disco lighting modes – Multi-color Rotation, Single-color Rotation, Single-color Breathing, and Single-color Steady in sync with the music. Karaoke machine independent buttons control the lights, ensuring one-touch convenience. These colorful LED lights on karaoke speaker create immersive, energetic karaoke experiences, enhancing the party atmosphere.

[Choose your preferred audio source mode] Our bluetooth karaoke machine for adults features built-in bluetooth 5.0, providing compatibility with most wireless bluetooth devices. Additionally, it offers a Micro TF card slot (up to 32GB) and a USB flash drive slot (up to 32GB), allowing you to play your favorite music from various sources. The karaoke machine with 2 microphones and multiple audio sources is an ideal choice for personal gatherings, street performances, and fitness instruction.

[Host parties on the go] Our compact bluetooth karaoke machine is easy to carry with its durable shoulder strap. The karaoke machine rechargeable batteries offer 3-4 hours of use, with just a 3-hour charge for the speaker and about 1 hour for the microphone. Sing your heart out anytime, anywhere. Package dimensions: 312*150*211 MM

[Give the perfect gift] Our bluetooth karaoke machine for adults, is ideal for holidays gifts like Christmas gifts, Valentine's Day gifts, birthdays gifts, anniversaries gifts, and more. You'll get: 1 * Portable Karaoke Machine, 2 * Wireless bluetooth Microphones, 1 * Adjustable Shoulder Strap, 1 * User Manual, 1 * Charging Cable. Have questions? Contact us anytime; we'll respond within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect karaoke machine!
reviews.reviewText: It’s a little on the pricier side for such a small machine, but it’s wonderful. The battery lasted through ~6 hours of nonstop singing, and the microphone batteries outlasted the machine’s! It’s perfect for parties and has great sound. I was super impressed by it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great great great product!
reviews.reviewText: This little machine is amazing. The volume is amazing and my 1.5 year old granddaughter loves hearing herself sing. Hooks up to Bluetooth and she sings along to all her favorites. Grandma or her brother grab the other mic and sing along! If you’re in the fence about purchasing, pull the trigger! You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun
reviews.reviewText: The baby voice is spot on for an Alvin and the chipmunks sing along…kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little machine!
reviews.reviewText: My 5 and 6 year old had the best time singing and experimenting with the voices fx. Then my husband and I surprised them and sang YMCA in the baby voice and started rolling on the ground cry laughing. Sound quality was great, but will turn off if the volume and mics are too loud.There is only 1 cord for the entire kit and you need 3 usb c cords. One for the speaker and 1 for each mic. I thought somehow the mics would charge inside the speaker somehow since it wasn’t written in a review or mentioned elsewhere. That’s on me, but maybe someone else will read this and that’ll clear it up for them. We luckily had those floating around the house but would’ve been frustrated if we had to order more or go to the store on top of the 3 hour charge time.4 stars for the sound issue and unit completely turning off and the one usb c cord for charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great family, fun gift! Worked out perfect
reviews.reviewText: I bought this from my granddaughter for her birthday. It was an instant family hit. Everyone loved using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Lots of fun. Very well made. Best of all, superb customer service available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I first turned it on, the mic was on echo and I got nervous to the sound was always going to sound like that lol but NOPE the originally sound is PERFECT and it gets loud too! I love this machine and it will be coming with me to every family event. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Oh my gah this was so much fun. Worked way better than expected and we loved the voice changer which we didn’t even know it had. Whole family had a blast.
